title: Deal playground
subtitle: This page allows you to send dummy proposals to the pricing engine based on your CIDGravity configuration.

loading.title: Wait for a result
loading.description: You deal proposal is being treated, wait this view to be updated with the result

waiting.title: Wait for a request
waiting.description: Fill the form to test a deal proposal throught your pricing models

error.title: Bad request
error.reason: Your deal proposal can't be analysed due to a error, if this behavior persist, please report it to the support team

validation.isFromAddressNotSupported: The from address you provide doesn't match a valid Filecoin address
validation.isFromAddressMandatory: From address is required to launch a test request
validation.isDurationOutsideLimits: Check the duration, limits are min = 180 days and max 548 days!
validation.isProposalPieceSizeUnderLimit: The deal size can't be under 256B!
validation.isTestFailed: Test failed, please try again in few minutes

error.isFromAddressNotSupported: The from address you provide doesn't match a valid Filecoin address
